name: INITIAL ROGUE
description:
It's a roguelike racing game for 7DRL 2023!

It's almost a tradtional roguelike*

  • Procedurally generated levels!
  • Turn-based interactions!
  • Grid-based environment!
  • Death is permanent!

*Sadly I didn't have time to add RPG elements. so judge how you will.

instructions:

  • ENTER: advance simulation
  • Use q-u on the keyboard to set ur brake/gas amount this turn
  • Use a-j on the keyboard to set ur turn amount
  • 1: to retry current map
  • 2: new map
  • 3: toggle window size between 1920 and 960
  • 4: fullscreen mode
